text: Shi ta [an la] zai yejian [nimen shuimian shi] qu zou nimen de linghun [er rang nimen shuimian], ta zhidao nimen zai baizhou suo zuo de yiqie. Ranhou, ta zai baizhou shi nimen xing lai, yibian [nimen] wancheng guiding de shou xian. Ranhou, nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu, zuihou, ta jiang ba nimen cengjing suo zuo de gaosu nimen.
